item.title: About us
item.author: info@flamepointbrewing.com
item.description:
Flame Point Brewing

Proprieters: Chris and Kelly Baker

We are a home brewery operating in Marianna, FL since 2019. We specialize in low-gravity beers (typically around 3% ABV) influenced by traditional styles. We brew for friends and family, and we serve our beers at charity events around Northwest Florida.

Our History

Chris began homebrewing after moving to Albuquerque, New Mexico, inspired by coworkers at Sandia National Labs and members of the Dukes of Ale Homebrew Club. Carrying this hobby with him to Knoxville, TN, onto Tallahassee, FL, and eventually back to Marianna, FL, Chris has continuously focused on brewing accessible session beers that may not be commercially available. Alongside occasional stints helping out at Southern Fields Brewing Company, Chris enjoys brewing small batches in the garage, alongside the brewery’s namesake and mascot, Kiki the flame point Siamese.
